item.source: If i dont have a router do i port forward through my modem?

item.title: If i dont have a router do i port forward through my modem?
item.dc:creator: @bhpkyeah satesql
item.description:
@bhpkyeah wrote:

you need to dl jdk update 1.6.0_5 and make sure u dl the offline and online… Once that is done compile it…

you can use this compiler works good…

open your notepad copy this in there

@ECHO OFF title Server "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause

file----save as—compiler.bat—save make sure the compiler is in your source file

also only dl from safe files… and make sure u edit to make sure there not fucking up ur computer… You also have to edit this in your enviroment variables as well…

And any more people that are having same issue i suggest u read this

Read full topic

item.source: If i dont have a router do i port forward through my modem?

item.title: If i dont have a router do i port forward through my modem?
item.dc:creator: @bhpkyeah satesql
item.description:
@bhpkyeah wrote:

Your not getting what im saying you don’t need to open a port in ur firewall… Your already allowing no-ip to open that port. And hamachi is like no-ip but instead of webased its working as a network adapter… If you notice when you dl hamachi and have it running you will find it in the connections application. And hamachi isnt safe

Read full topic

item.title: If i dont have a router do i port forward through my modem?
item.dc:creator: @bhpkyeah satesql
item.description:
@bhpkyeah wrote:

Thats just to make your server run has nothing to do with portforwarding… Look at what it says port (which is whats on your computer) forward(meaning that your allowing a specific port open) I dont have a router just a wired modem, i register my no-ip and i was done.

item.source: If i dont have a router do i port forward through my modem?

item.title: If i dont have a router do i port forward through my modem?
item.dc:creator: @bhpkyeah satesql
item.description:
@bhpkyeah wrote:

If you have a wired modem you dont need a router or hamachi… just register to no-ip make your server name… and your done. I dont know why some many people use hamachi if they have a wired modem… Wired meaning it directly connects to your computer.

Read full topic

item.source: If i dont have a router do i port forward through my modem?

item.title: If i dont have a router do i port forward through my modem?
item.dc:creator: @codeusa codeusa
item.description:
@codeusa wrote:

step 1:Download winrar [if you havnt got go to www.google.com and download]
step2:find a source [here is one from alleyscape http://uppit.com/164M56 ]
step3:save to your desktop and load it then click " CLOSE "
step4:go to your desktop and right click on alleyscape[in books] and press extract here
step5:let that load
step6:once finished loading go to bottom and click Run[some will have run server run.bat] if they dont work look for Voule
step7:load silab put your username,password and your hamachi i.p in
step8:if it logs in make a hamachi network and that will be use for your server
step9:Enjoy your server[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 09, 2008, 05:11:29 PM[/size][hr]oh get hamchi from https://secure.logmein.com/products/hamachi/vpn.asp?lang=en

Read full topic
